name: natzar/stripe-pad
description: The PHP SaaS boilerplate to launch fast with Stripe

scripts.locale-init: for lang in en_US.utf8 es_ES.utf8; do msginit --no-translator --input=./locale/messages.pot --locale=$lang.utf8 --output-file=./locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po; done
scripts.locale-clear-fuzzy: for lang in en_US.utf8 es_ES.utf8; do msgattrib --clear-fuzzy -o ./locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po ./locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po; done
scripts.locale-build-all: for lang in en_US.utf8 es_ES.utf8; do msgfmt -o ./locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/messages.mo ./locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/messages.po; done
scripts.locale-update: composer locale-strings && composer locale-merge && composer locale-clear-fuzzy && composer locale-build-all
